mapper.select: SELECT * FROM donation ORDER BY don_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO donation (don_name, don_ex, don_summary, don_goal, don_start_date, don_end_date, d_img1_nn,d_img1_addr) VALUES(#{don_name}, #{don_ex}, #{don_summary}, #{don_goal},#{don_start_date},#{don_end_date},#{d_img1_nn},#{d_img1_addr})
mapper.update: UPDATE donation SET don_name=#{don_name}, don_start_date=#{don_start_date}, don_end_date=#{don_end_date}, don_goal=#{don_goal}, don_ex=#{don_ex}, don_summary=#{don_summary}, d_img1_nn=#{d_img1_nn} WHERE don_no = #{don_no}
